Introduction
This topic includes information about assigning effective dates based on receipt of supplemental service department records, including
effective date of claims reconsidered under 38 CFR 3.156(c)
example of effective dates assigned under 38 CFR 3.156(c)
, and
October 2006 substantive rule change to 38 CFR 3.156(c)(2)
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Revision Based on Receipt of Supplemental Service Records
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
